001package Corner_Detection;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.Shape;
006import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
007import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
008import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
009import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
010import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.Arrow;
017import ij.gui.Line;
018import ij.gui.PointRoi;
019import ij.gui.PolygonRoi;
020import ij.gui.Roi;
021import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
022import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
023import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
024import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageGraphics;
025import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
026import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
027import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
028import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
029import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters;
030import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
031import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
032import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.MaxLocator.Method;
033
034/**
035 * Creates a small image containing a single rotated rectangle.
036 * @author WB
037 *
038 */
039public class Make_Corner_Test_Image4 implements PlugIn {
040        
041        // size of the original image
042        static int origWidth = 64;
043        static int origHeight = 64;
044        
045        static double rectW = 30;
046        static double rectH = 50;
047        static double angle = 0.2;
048
049
050        @Override
051        public void run(String arg) {
052
053                ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(origWidth, origHeight);
054                ip.setColor(128);
055                ip.fill();
056                
057                double xc = 0.5 * origWidth;
058                double yc = 0.5 * origHeight;
059                
060                Rectangle2D rect = new Rectangle2D.Double(xc - rectW/2, yc - rectH/2, rectW, rectH);
061                AffineTransform R = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(angle, xc, yc);
062                
063                AffineTransform T = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(2.3, 0);
064                Shape rectR = R.createTransformedShape(rect);
065                
066                try (ImageGraphics ig = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
067                        ig.setColor(255);
068//                      g.setLineWidth(0);
069                        Graphics2D g2 = ig.getGraphics();
070                        g2.fill(rectR);
071                }
072                
073                
074                Parameters params = new Parameters();
075                params.doCleanUp = false;
076                params.border = 5;
077                params.maxLocatorMethod = Method.QuadraticLeastSquares; //Method.Quartic; //Method.Parabolic; //Method.None; //
078                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
079                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
080                
081                CornerOverlay.DefaultMarkerSize = 3;
082                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
083                oly.strokeColor(Color.green);
084                oly.strokeWidth(1.0);
085                oly.addItems(corners);
086                
087                
088                // draw the true rectangle
089//              List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(rectR);
090//              Roi roiR = makePolygon(rectPoints);
091                Roi roiR = new ShapeRoi(rectR);
092                roiR.setStrokeColor(Color.blue);
093                roiR.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
094                oly.addRoi(roiR);
095                        
096                // find the closest corner for each rectangle point
097                List<Point> cornerPoints = new LinkedList<>();
098                List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(rectR);
099                for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
100                        Point p = rectPoints.get(i);
101                        Corner c = findClosest(p, corners);
102                        cornerPoints.add(c);
103                }
104                        
105                // create the detected corner polygon
106                Roi roiC = makePolygon(cornerPoints);
107                roiC.setStrokeColor(Color.red);
108                roiC.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
109                oly.addRoi(roiC, true);
110                
111                
112                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus("Corner Test", ip);
113                im.setOverlay(oly);
114                im.show();
115
116                //IJ.runPlugIn(Find_Corners_Harris.class.getName(), null);
117        }
118        
119        void listPoints(Shape s) {
120                IJ.log("rectangle: ");
121                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
122                double[] coords = new double[6];
123                while (!pi.isDone()) {
124                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
125                        IJ.log("  " + Matrix.toString(coords));
126                        pi.next();
127                }
128        }
129        
130        List<Point> getPoints(Shape s) {
131                List<Point> points = new LinkedList<>();
132                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
133                double[] coords = new double[6];
134                while (!pi.isDone()) {
135                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
136                        points.add(Point.create(coords[0], coords[1]));
137                        pi.next();
138                }
139                return points;
140        }
141        
142        Corner findClosest(Point p, List<Corner> corners) {
143                Corner minCorner = null;
144                double minDist = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
145                for (Corner c : corners) {
146                        double dist2 = p.distance2(c);
147                        if (dist2 < minDist) {
148                                minCorner = c;
149                                minDist = dist2;
150                        }
151                }
152                return minCorner;
153        }
154        
155        ShapeRoi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
156                Point[] pa = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
157                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();
158                poly.moveTo(pa[0].getX(), pa[0].getY());
159                for (int i=1; i<pa.length; i++) {
160                        poly.lineTo(pa[i].getX(), pa[i].getY());
161                }
162                poly.closePath();
163                return new ShapeRoi(poly);
164        }
165        
166//      Roi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
167//              Point[] pointA = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
168//              
169//              float[] xPoints = new float[pointA.length];
170//              float[] yPoints = new float[pointA.length];
171//              
172//              for (int i = 0; i < pointA.length; i++) {
173//                      xPoints[i] = (float) pointA[i].getX();
174//                      yPoints[i] = (float) pointA[i].getY();
175//              }
176//              PolygonRoi pRoi = new PolygonRoi(xPoints, yPoints, Roi.POLYLINE);
177//              
178//              return pRoi;
179//      }
180
181}
